name: Lait De Soja Vanille — Provamel — 1 L
ingredients:
eau, fèves de soja décortiquées (8,7%), sucre de canne roux, extrait de vanille Bourbon (0,2%), sel marin.
*= issus de l'agriculture biologique.
Categorie: Cibi e bevande a base vegetale, Bevande, Cibi a base vegetale, Legumes and their products, Plant-based beverages, Milk substitute, Plant milks, Legume milks, Bevanda di soia, Sugared beverages, Vanilla soy milks
Etichette, certificazioni, premi: Biologico, Vegetariano, Biologico UE, FSC, Vegano, FSC-C014047, Senza glutine, Senza lattosio, fr
